<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Medic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2027) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=69)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9); [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760)

</column>

---

You become an expert in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9). When you succeed with [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760) or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57), the target regains 5 additional HP at DC 20, 10 HP at DC 30, or 15 HP at DC 40. Once per day, you can use Battle Medicine on a creature that's temporarily immune. If you're a master in Medicine, you can do so once per hour.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the medic archetype.

<title level="2">Medic Dedication leads to...</title>
[Doctor's Visitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2028), [Preventative Treatment](/Feats.aspx?ID=3618), [Resuscitate](/Feats.aspx?ID=2031), [Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2029)
